title: Flatpak version (1.12.3) takes a long time to open
body:
**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.
When I am launching the Flatpak version of teams-for-linux it takes almost 2 minutes to open (measured about 1 minute 40 seconds)

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Launch the application installed from Flathub

**Expected behavior**
I would expect it to launch within 10-20 seoncds at most. Using the AppImage version launches in that time window, so does the version installed using AUR.

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - Ubuntu 24.10 and EndeavourOS
 - Flatpak
 - 1.12.3
 - If I rollback to version 1.11.2 the application launches instantly

**Debug**
This is what the terminal prints:
```
$ flatpak run com.github.IsmaelMartinez.teams_for_linux
```
